final_mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    A[Review application and budget forms] --> B[Room booking]
    B --> C[Set up account]
    C --> |web services| D[Set up course website]
    C --> |finance| E[Registration website setup]
    C --> |marketing| F[Promote course]
    D --> G{ParallelGateway}
    E --> G
    F --> G
    G --> H[Handle payments]
    H --> I{XORGateway}
    I --> |insufficient registrations| J[Notify registered participants of cancellation]
    I --> |sufficient registrations| K{ParallelGateway}
    J --> L((course cancelled))
    K --> |Badges required| M[Print name badges]
    K --> |Blackboard required| N[Set up Blackboard website for students]
    K --> |Catering required| O[Catering arranging]
    M --> P{ParallelGateway}
    N --> P
    O --> P
    P --> Q[Course delivery]
    Q --> R((close))
